deployPool(address,bytes).details: Depending on the characteristic of the tokens or protocols, a different type of pool may be required.      This structure makes it easy to create custom pools.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addToWhitelistFactory(address).notice: Allows creation of pools through the pool factory, admin only

getFactoryAddress(address).notice: Return the address of Factory deployed pool

getPoolAddress(uint256).notice: Return the address of pool by index

pools(address).notice: Return whether the pool was deployed via a deployer

protocolFeeTo().notice: Return the address receiving protocol fees from Pool

removeFromWhitelistFactory(address).notice: Disallows creation of pools through the pool factory, admin only

setAirdropDistributor(address).notice: set Airdrop Distributor Contract, admin only

setProtocolFeeTo(address).notice: set address to receive protocol Fee, admin only

totalPoolsCount().notice: Return the number of pools deployed from masterDeployer

userdoc.notice: Pool deployer contract with template factory whitelist
